verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Nearer, my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee! E’en though it be a cross that raiseth me, Still all my song shall be, nearer, my God, to Thee.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: Nearer, my God, to Thee, nearer to Thee!

v3

verse.lines: Or, if on joyful wing cleaving the sky, Sun, moon, and stars forgot, upward I’ll fly, Still all my song shall be, nearer, my God, to Thee.
